name: Anomaly (itch)
description:
There is nothing wrong with curiosity. It drives exploration and human ingenuity across the dimensional mirror.

IF YOU CAN'T SEE ANYTHING ON YOUR FIRST LEVEL, PRESS ESCAPE AND CLICK NEXT MESSAGE TO ROLL A NEW WORLD.

This game features procedurally generated environments, multiple universe/biomes, procedurally generated NPCs and player characters, a custom sprite animation system, and elusive Anomalies, characters that exist out of time and space that you can find in certain worlds. Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018.

ESC: Pause

Directional: Arrows or WASD

Space: Jump

Mouse: Click Text
